skills.title: Html

skills.title: Css
skills.desc: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a simple mechanism for adding style (e.g., fonts, colors, spacing) to Web documents.

skills.title: Scss/Sass
skills.desc: CSS with superpowers. Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

skills.title: Tailwind
skills.desc: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.

skills.title: Bootstrap
skills.desc: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.desc: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight interpreted (or just-in-time compiled) programming language with first-class functions.

skills.title: ReactJs
skills.desc: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components.

skills.title: Github
skills.desc: GitHub is a developer platform that allows developers to create, store, manage and share their code.
